fundraiserText_old:
Le Canne should continue to exist as the most beautiful holiday destination in Tuscany.
We probably share this idea with many enthusiasts ;). Since we lack the financial means to purchase it, we rely on your support. Only together can we save Le Canne.
Soon, you'll find the link to the crowdfunding campaign here. Follow us on your favorite channels to stay updated!
Every donation counts!
fundraiserText:
The farm must continue to exist as the most beautiful holiday destination in Tuscany.
We probably share this idea with many passionate people ;).

After last winter's storm and the resulting damage, we are counting on your support.
Every donation counts!
contactDescr: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us for any inquiries.
